summary: In this Stephen King-like movie about good versus evil, Lien, Sien and Fien Kriegel, unseparable eleven-year-old triplets, set fire to their school. The sisters get arrested and are put ... See full summary »
cast: Katleen Apers|Evelien Apers|Dorien Janssens|Victor Löw|Liesbeth Kamerling|Veerle Baetens|Katrien De Ruysscher|Nico Sturm|Gilda De Bal|Marc Peeters|Andreas Meermans|Kristine Van Pellicom|Bob De Moor|Walter Smits|Tania Poppe|Geert Van Rampelberg|Steven Van Herreweghe|Hendrik Van Eycken|Aza Declercq|Kris Swinnen|Marc de Bel
title: De zusjes Kriegel
